org.crsh.shell.impl.async
Class AsyncShell

java.lang.Object
  org.crsh.shell.impl.async.AsyncShell
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Shell
public class AsyncShell
extends Object
implements Shell, Closeable

The async shell wraps a shell and provides command cancellation. The shell executes the command in a separate thread allowing using the wrapped shell to which it delegates the business command execution. This implementation allows the execution of several process in parallel

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Julien Viet
